mapper.update:
update P_POS_REWARD
AGENT_PID = #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_CONS_MONTH = #{totalConsMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROW_AMT = #{growAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREDIT_CONS_MONTH = #{creditConsMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REWARD_SCALE = #{rewardScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
TOTAL_END_MONTH = #{totalEndMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MACHINERY_NUM = #{machineryNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CREATE_TM= #{createTm,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update P_POS_REWARD set AGENT_PID = #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_CONS_MONTH = #{totalConsMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROW_AMT = #{growAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREDIT_CONS_MONTH = #{creditConsMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REWARD_SCALE = #{rewardScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, TOTAL_END_MONTH = #{totalEndMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MACHINERY_NUM = #{machineryNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREATE_TM = #{createTm,jdbcType=CHAR}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
